title: Is there a specific order for receiving the free gift from Riot?
body:
First of all, it is very kind of Riot to think about their players and give free gifts, ty for that!
But when i read the requirements for receiving one, i met those requirements.

This is not a complaint post or a post to rush Riot, but when does one person 
receive the gift from Riot? Or is it just a lot of people to go through?

Thanks in advance

replies.body: I almost fainted when i didn't get one and my friends did, even tho i did nothing wrong.
We don't really know but they are sending them out in waves apparently, just be patient there are a lot of summoners that need gifts ahah
